set.set_2: Increase final damage by **5%**/**6%**/**7%**/**8%** every time you switch to this weapon. Increase frost damage by an additional **3%** for **1800** seconds if it's a frost weapon. Only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.set_4: Increase final damage by **6%**/**8%**/**9%**/**11%** for **1800** seconds every time you use Unyielding Wing's discharge skill, stacking up to **2** times. Remove **1** stack when the duration ends. This set effect works in the off-hand slot and the same Matrix's effect cannot be stacked repeatedly. Endurance consumption in the Latent State is reduced by **50%**.
